original_text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years, which had spent all her living upon physicians, neither could be healed of any,
korean_text: 이에 열두 해를 혈루증으로 앓는 중에 아무에게도 고침을 받지 못하던 여자가

sentences.original_text: And a woman having an issue of blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 혈액 문제를 가진 한 여인이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: which had spent all her living upon physicians
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 의사들에게 모든 재산을 써 버렸으나

sentences.original_text: neither could be healed of any
